TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyDataContractResolver extends System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver

summary.span: 針對為了非持續性資料類別所建立的 Proxy 類型，此類別可協助將其解析為非持續性物件的實際類型。

span.span: This class helps resolve proxy types that were created for persistence-ignorant data classes to the actual types of persistence-ignorant objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會搭配。The class is used with the .

summary.span: 還原序列化期間，將任何 資訊對應到[非持續性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)物件的實際類型。

span.span: During deserialization, maps any information to the actual type of the [persistence-ignorant](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3) object.
